```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


Libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

Dataset
```{r}
data <- read.csv("forestfires.csv")

data
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = data, aes(x = temp, y = area)) +
    geom_point(color = "red") +
    labs(title = "Temp vs Area")
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = data, aes(x = RH, y = area)) +
    geom_point(color = "steelblue") +
    labs(title = "Humidity vs Area")
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = data, aes(x = temp, y = area)) +
    geom_point(color = "green") +
    labs(title = "Wind vs Area")
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = data, aes(x = ISI, y = area)) +
    geom_point(color = "pink") +
    labs(title = "ISI vs Area")
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = data, aes(x = FFMC, y = area)) +
    geom_point(color = "purple") +
    labs(title = "FFMC vs Area")
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = data, aes(x = DMC, y = area)) +
    geom_point(color = "cyan") +
    labs(title = "DMC vs Area")
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = data, aes(x = DC, y = area)) +

```

